text.name: ui_intro_text_1
text.text: To get started, use Manage Groups to create a Group. A group is a logical container for related tasks, for example Field 10, or General Farm Tasks.

text.name: ui_intro_text_2
text.text: Once you have made a group, use Manage Tasks to define things you need to do and when.

text.name: ui_intro_text_3
text.text: A task is just plain text, such as Feed the Cows, or Harvest.

text.name: ui_intro_text_4
text.text: Tasks can one off things or recur by month or day, or by a multiple of months of days.

text.name: ui_intro_text_5
text.text: When a task is due it will show here. Use Complete Task when it is done. If it is a recurring task, it will show again when due.

text.name: ui_intro_text_6
text.text: A group and all of its tasks can be easily copied to a new group if needed.

text.name: ui_intro_text_7
text.text: You can view tasks currently due while playing by pressing Shift + T.

text.name: ui_set_task_priority
text.text: Set the task priority. This is used for ordering tasks so you know what to do first.

text.name: ui_set_task_n_months
text.text: How frequent in months should the task be completed?

text.name: ui_set_task_n_days
text.text: How frequent in days should the task be completed?

text.name: ui_group_exists_error
text.text: A group with this name already exists

text.name: ui_no_name_specified_error
text.text: No name for the group was specified

text.name: ui_confirm_deletion
text.text: Are you sure you want to delete?

text.name: ui_group_not_found_error
text.text: Could not find the group. Check the group was not deleted

text.name: ui_task_not_found_error
text.text: Could not find the task. Check the task was not deleted

text.name: ui_no_groups_exist
text.text: You don't have any groups yet

text.name: ui_no_tasks_exist_for_group
text.text: You don't have any tasks yet

text.name: ui_no_active_tasks
text.text: You don't have any tasks due

text.name: ui_set_task_effort
text.text: Set the effort level for this task. This is used to differentiate small and large tasks when calculating workload over time.

text.name: ui_group_request_type_description
text.text: Choose a group type. A Standard group contains tasks that will be shown when due. A Template defines tasks as a template only. Then you can define multiple Template Instance groups that use the same Template and manage them in one place.

text.name: ui_group_request_source_group
text.text: Choose a Template to use for this group.

text.name: ui_confirm_deletion_template
text.text: Are you sure you want to delete? Deleting a Template will delete all Template Instance groups associated with it.
